description:
Jun begins to lose the support of the students as she continues on her impassioned crusade.  The shock drives Jun to attend a pro wrestling match to cheer herself up.
Keima uses a special ticket made by Elsie to ambush Jun and forces her to face the barrier of reality that she came up against in her past...
A touching ending to the three episode story of the young student teacher, Jun Nagase, who faces both ideal and reality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There`s Always a Sun in Your Heart
